comments.title: No seal, open box , underweight
comments.description: This product is without any seal or lock . Total weight is 378grams including the weight of tin box . Whereas the weight of powder is supposed to be 280grams. Tin box can't be just 98 grams . Can't buy a body product which does not have a seal, it may get contaminated .

comments.title: Good product, not so good reseller
comments.description: Dermi Cool powder is good for the heat and for folks with certain powder allergies, this helps. I am scoring this product down to 3 stars because I received the right product but the product was to be given with a free (check photo) which was not given. So the reseller sells that separately. Not cool (pun intended).

comments.title: Too good
comments.description: Its a very good powder.Have been using it daily for last more than three years.I use it over groin area since i get frequent skin infection.It does wonders for me.although its written on pack, not to use in groins.Still test it for youself for groins.But over all, best for itches,odour, as it stays longer, mine 12hours.Its a must for me. buy it for sure, you are gonna love it.And yes, delivery charges are too high,thats y i deducted one star.

comments.title: Product is awesome but seller is cheating
comments.description: The product is very good for prickly heat and boils. It provides a soothing cooling sensation. But do not buy from this seller. He is selling this for 175 rupees(free delivery) whereas the original cost is 105 rupees. He has scratched the amount to hide it. Also there was an offer with free product worth 40 rupees of 50g of the same product which was not given.
